content.raw:
The example_plugins tests are [failing on mac home-brew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-homebrew-amd64/85/testReport/):
~~~
195: [  FAILED  ] ExamplePlugins/ExamplePlugins.Build/0, where GetParam() = "animate_joints"
195: [  FAILED  ] ExamplePlugins/ExamplePlugins.Build/1, where GetParam() = "animate_pose"
~~~
Detailed build errors:
~~~

195: [  FAILED  ] ExamplePlugins/ExamplePlugins.Build/0, where GetParam() = "animate_joints" (2490 ms)
~~~

content.html:
The example_plugins tests are failing on mac home-brew:

195: [  FAILED  ] ExamplePlugins/ExamplePlugins.Build/0, where GetParam() = "animate_joints"
195: [  FAILED  ] ExamplePlugins/ExamplePlugins.Build/1, where GetParam() = "animate_pose"

update.description:
This replaces pull request #1023.

Here is the [tutorial](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials/?tut=animated_box) for this.

NOTE: After merge, update the tutorial so that the code references point to "default" not this branch.

content.raw: Reviewing this, I would like to send a different PR to handle the inclusion of all currently missed examples (plugins and stand_alone) from being compiled by the test suite, it needs some code changes unrelated to this PR. So, ok for me to go. I will send the PR after this is merged.
content.html: Reviewing this, I would like to send a different PR to handle the inclusion of all currently missed examples (plugins and stand_alone) from being compiled by the test suite, it needs some code changes unrelated to this PR. So, ok for me to go. I will send the PR after this is merged.

content.raw: I believe that, not all the plugins and the animated box examples, are being compiled by our test suite. We probably need to add them to the proper [test source file](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/fde1f43a680b003511955b7a2720608db95319aa/test/examples/example_plugins.cc?at=default#cl-81).
content.html: I believe that, not all the plugins and the animated box examples, are being compiled by our test suite. We probably need to add them to the proper test source file.
